name: Zank
description:
Zank is an Asteroids clone with added features. My first "complete" game project. I didn't get to add everything I would have liked but it's time to move on. Might revisit this some day to get those extra fun features working.

  • W - Move Forward
  • A - Turn Left
  • D - Turn Right
  • Spacebar - Shoot

When your Zank (score) gets up to 100, you get an extra life!
